article_title: The magic word that caused the Rick Scott Starbucks video to go viral [video]
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: What did you expect? Civility? In 2016? Governor Rick Scott stopped at a Gainesville Starbucks Tuesday evening and happened across Cara Jennings. It was not what the governor would call a serendipitous moment. MoreBut it was her use of a magic word that elevated the confrontation to national news. She called the governor an a---e.
article_metadata.author: Fred Grimm The Miami Herald
